mapper.select: select distinct count(person_id) as totalPatientCnt from person
select count(case when gender_concept_id='8507' then 1 end) as maleCnt , count(case when gender_concept_id='8532' then 1 end) as femaleCnt from person

select count(case when race_concept_id='8515' then 1 end) as asianPatientCnt , count(case when race_concept_id='8516' then 1 end) as blackPatientCnt , count(case when race_concept_id='8527' then 1 end) as whitePatientCnt , count(case when race_concept_id='native' then 1 end) as nativePatientCnt , count(case when race_concept_id='other' then 1 end) as otherPatientCnt from person
select count(case when ethnicity_source_value='hispanic' then 1 end) as hispanicPatientCnt , count(case when ethnicity_source_value='nonhispanic' then 1 end) as nonhispanicPatientCnt from person
select count(*) as deathPatientCnt from death a left outer join death b on a.person_id = b.person_id
